name: Moon Base Alpha
desc: Experience low gravity and historical Apollo sites in our primary lunar settlement. A perfect introduction to space tourism with luxury habitats.

name: Europa Deep Dive
desc: Submarine expeditions under the thick ice crust of Jupiter's moon. Discover the hidden oceans and potential alien microbial life.

name: Mars Red Canyon
desc: Hiking adventures through the Olympus Mons and the vast red dunes. This destination offers rugged exploration for the adventurous soul.

name: Titan Lakes
desc: Witness the stunning rings of Saturn from the methane lakes of Titan. A cold but breathtaking view unlike anything in the solar system.

name: Venus Cloud City
desc: Float above the scorching surface of Venus in a high-altitude city. Enjoy spectacular views of the thick cloud cover and the sunlit horizon.

name: Asteroid Belt Mining Colony
desc: Join a pioneering community in the asteroid belt, extracting valuable minerals while experiencing microgravity living.
